medium_description_en: Adds sodium to the MELD model for liver cirrhosis.
short_description_en: MELD + Na: More accurate than MELD.
instructions_en: Note: The Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network recently incorporated sodium into their <calculator id='78'>new MELD Score</calculator> as of January 2016, using a different model than MELD-Na. We recommend using the <calculator id='78'>new MELD Score</calculator> primarily.

seo.meta_description_en: The MELDNa/MELD-Na Score for Liver Cirrhosis adds sodium to the MELD model to evaluate liver cirrhosis severity.
seo.keywords_en: MELDNA, meld-na, meld na, meld cirrhosis, meld cirrhosis calc, meld cirrhosis score, meldna for liver cirrhosis, meld na for cirrhosis, meldna calc, meld cirrhosis, meldna score, meldna calc, meldna prognosis, meldna mortality, meld score, meldna model, meld model na, meld sodium, meld sodium calc, medl sodium score, meld sodium model, sodium cirrhosis, sodium liver calc, sodium liver disease calc, sodium cirrhosis calc, sodium cirrhosis score

how_to_use.why_use_en: The MELD-Na may improve upon the MELD Score for liver cirrhosis.

next_steps.advice_en: Patients should be evaluated for transplant if no reversible causes of cirrhosis can be identified.

about.formula_en:
MELD-Na = MELD Score - Na - 0.025 x MELD x (140-Na) + 140

Sodium is limited in a range of 125-140, and if outside of these bounds, is set to the nearest limit.
